EmailTemplate.subject: Buy Paper, Get A FREE Treat
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/OX9001_Boise_X-9_Multi-Use_Copy_Paper%2c_20_lb_%2c_White%2c_Letter-size_(8_12_x_11)%2c_Ream.aspx?mode=direct?cmp=EBBSNOVBLITZ194EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Boise X-9 Multi-Use Copy Paper, 20 lb., White, Letter-size (8 1/2" x 11"), Ream
Use code 1911GUM **
Free Shipping In Stock Clearance Deal Centre Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111 *Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only and one redemption per customer while quantities last. Enter promo code 1911GUM at checkout. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. While Quantities Last, excludes furniture transactions, 1 per customer. Open to Canadian residents only. Offer expires on November 16, 2019. © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited ${customBodyHtml1}
